mapper.insert: insert into stockprice (StockId, TranDate, TranTime, Price, Amount, LastUpdateTime, CreateTime) values (#{stockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update stockprice set TranDate = #{tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TranTime = #{tranTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LastUpdateTime = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where StockId = #{stockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select StockId, TranDate, TranTime, Price, Amount, LastUpdateTime, CreateTime from stockprice
